bibl.title: The Eponymous Officials of Greek Cities IV. The Register. Part III: Thrace, Black Sea Area, Asia Minor (continued). - Part IV: Syria and the East. - Part V: North Africa. (To be concluded.)

SHERK Robert K., The Eponymous Officials of Greek Cities IV. The Register. Part III: Thrace, Black Sea Area, Asia Minor (continued). - Part IV: Syria and the East. - Part V: North Africa. (To be concluded.)
